customized model APIs

GraphStorm .

Dataloaders

Models

model.GSgnnNodeModelBase

The base class for node-prediction GNN

model.GSgnnModelBase

GraphStorm GNN model base class

model.GSgnnNodeModelInterface

The interface for GraphStorm node prediction model.

model.GSgnnEdgeModelInterface

The interface for GraphStorm edge prediction model.

model.GSgnnLinkPredictionModelInterface

The interface for GraphStorm link prediction model.

Evaluators

If users want to implement customized evaluators or evaluation methods, a best practice is to extend the eval.GSgnnInstanceEvaluator class, and implement the abstract methods.

eval.GSgnnInstanceEvaluator

Template class for user defined evaluator.
